title: 2016 Spring PR/Media Relations Internship - Pro Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: 2016 Spring PR/Media Relations Internship Pro Sports Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Duties include writing press releases, posting on behalf of the team on various social networks, and cultivating relationships with local media personnel and outlets.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
